Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and UIC Halsted due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and UIC Halsted due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Damen to Ohare  and UIC Halsted to Forest Park at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #56 Milwaukee and the #8 halsted or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
